items.title: All Terrain
items.description: All-terrain tires offer drivers traction on- and off-road, and are typically used by light truck and SUV drivers who want a tire that's able to climb rocks and perform on the highway.

items.title: All Season
items.description: Most common: Good handle on dry, wet or snow

items.title: Highway
items.description: Highway terrain tires are commonly used on light trucks and SUVs that typically haul materials or need to conquer highways and some off-road terrains.

items.title: Mud Terrain
items.description: Mud Terrain tires offer drivers traction on off-road terrains such as mud, dirt, sand, gravel, and rock, and are commonly used on CUVs, SUVs, light trucks, and jeeps.

items.title: Winter
items.description: For snow, ice, and freezing temperatures

items.title: All Weather
items.description: Combines an All Season and Winter tire traits for strong traction year-round

items.title: Performance
items.description: For sport/luxury vehicles and high-speed handling

items.title: Summer
items.description: For dry roads and warm, arid climates

items.title: Commercial Van
items.description: Also known as cargo tires, commercial van tires feature a C at the end of the tire's size and are built with durable, long-lasting materials to help drivers as they haul packages in pickup and delivery applications.

items.title: UHP
items.description: Used on sports and super cars in warm weather, sporty handling, and quick acceleration

header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 275-65r18 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA
Most popular among drivers in PA

content.body:
### Shop 275/65R18 Tire Size 275/65R18 is a larger tire size that’s typically found on trucks and full-sized SUVs. There’s a good chance you have 275/65R18 if you drive a Chevrolet Silverado 1500, Ford Expedition, RAM 1500, Toyota Sequoia, GMC Sierra 1500, or Nissan Titan XD, and a new version of one of these vehicles might roll out of the factory with a set of Goodyear Wrangler DuraTrac, Hankook Dynapro HT (RH12), Nexen Roadian HTX RH5, [Bridgestone Dueler H/T 684 II](https://simpletire.com/brands/bridgestone-tires/dueler-h-t-684-ii), or General Grabber APT tires attached. Popular vehicles: 2019-2021 Chevrolet Silverado 1500
2011-2021 Ford Expedition
2019-2021 RAM 1500
2008-2021 Toyota Sequoia
2019-2021 GMC Sierra 1500
2016-2021 Nissan Titan XD All-season tires provide drivers with solid traction and performance in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions, which makes them a common choice. Consider the [Pirelli Scorpion Verde All Season Plus II](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/scorpion-verde-all-season-plus-ii), Michelin Defender LTX M/S, Bridgestone Dueler H/L Alenza Plus, or Hankook Dynapro HP2 (RA33) if you want a set of 275/65R18 tires that performs well year-round. Highway terrain tires are commonly used on light trucks and larger SUVs thanks to their ability to haul heavy materials to and from a job site and provide better off-road traction than an all-season tire. Take a look at the Continental TerrainContact H/T, [General Grabber HTS60](https://simpletire.com/brands/general-tires/grabber-hts60), Yokohama Geolandar H/T G056, or Kumho Crugen HT51 if you’re looking for a set of 275/65R18 tires that can confidently help you haul something to and from a job site or anywhere else. Some drivers want to take their ride off-road from time to time, and drivers of light trucks and larger SUVs are no different. Check out the Toyo Open Country A/T III, [Nitto Terra Grappler G2](https://simpletire.com/brands/nitto-tires/terra-grappler-g2), Falken Wildpeak A/T3W, or BFGoodrich All-Terrain T/A KO2 if you want a set of tires that’s built to perform on- and off-road. Whether you drive a Chevrolet Silverado 1500, RAM 1500, Toyota Sequoia, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 275/65R18 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
